modShortDescription: Upgrade them all at your workbench today while saving on base resources for the previously made item.
modDescription:
Greetings Fellow Survivors,

Have you come to love your Tier 0 Stone Axe, your tier 1 Padded Hood or your Tier 2 Pipe [Pistol](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), But you have increased your perk to craft a better tier of that weapon, Well this can stop today there is no longer any need to store your old weapons and [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) that are to low of a tier, Upgrade them all at your workbench today while saving on base resources for the previously made item, to be upgraded just slap it in a bench gather a handful of ingredients/resources and let the process begin.

And the best part no game restart is required add it to your playthrough today!

Why Wait, Save the grind for stuff you cant find!

This is my first Mod ive Created, Feedback is welcome! – R3dHot

Version 1.0 – A20

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/4dksczcrvt2wcro/Upgradeable%20Items%20-R3dHot.rar?dl=1)**

If you appreciate R3dHot Gaming’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://paypal.me/R3dHot7D2DMods?country.x=GB&locale.x=en_GB).
